entry.title: [Network] WireGuard VPN Cheatsheet
entry.summary: Simplified Cheatsheet: WireGuard Setup &amp; Usage What is WireGuard WireGuard is a VPN protocol. It’s lightweight, fast, and uses modern cryptography primitives. Built directly into the Linux kernel, it’s designed to be simple yet extremely efficient — making it perfect for homelabs, remote work, and low-power devices (hello Raspberry Pi). Why use WireGuard? Lightning fast connection (...

entry.title: [Wiki] Traefik Multiples instances
entry.summary: Issue Traefik requires ports 80 and 443 for routing traffic to its applications, a router can forward these ports to only one internal host The challenge arises when you have multiple servers running Traefik and you want them to serve different domains but are limited to one external IP You want to host different services under different domains (example1.com and example2.com), each managed ...
